subject: Soccer
Retirement
lead_paragraph: Red Bulls midfielder Claudio Reyna is expected to announce his retirement at a news conference Wednesday afternoon in Newark. Reyna, who has often been injured, has not played in a game for the Red Bulls since May 25 as he struggled with a back injury.
